page.title: 10SMITHS BROTHERS WHITEHAVEN.
page.content: From 1973 Smiths has been one of the subsidiaries of Mardon Packaging International. Smiths Bros. is the largest converter of flexible packaging in the U.K.The majority of work is for the food trade.Up to date machinery ensures latest production processes. Polythene film for the bread & frozen food industries is blown at the factory.Medical packaging is one of the newer ventures which is becoming well established both at home & abroad.Smiths have their own 20 personnel art department where new designs are created.Â£60 million worth of equipment is used.It takes roughly two days to complete one design and 3 or 4 specimens before the client selects the final one.Over 100 different kinds of materials are used in designing.Many foreign companies are customers of Smiths Brothers.
